channel.title: How to put songs in a massively mini meda(very easy)
channel.description: 1.plug the usb cable in ur media and computer.then on my computer there will be a new icon. 2.open the new icon 3.now i use limewire to download songs.so get limewire from www.limewire.com 4.search for a song then wait it to be complete. 5.open the new icon on "my computer" 6.on limewire drag the song u downloaded to the folder. 7.unplug the media from the computer 8.now check the "music" menu and itll be there

item.title: How to put songs in a massively mini meda(very easy)
item.dc:creator: @blade_arrow0 blade arrow0
item.description:
@blade_arrow0 wrote:

1.plug the usb cable in ur media and computer.then on my computer there will be a new icon.
2.open the new icon
3.now i use limewire to download songs.so get limewire from www.limewire.com
4.search for a song then wait it to be complete.
5.open the new icon on “my computer”
6.on limewire drag the song u downloaded to the folder.
7.unplug the media from the computer
8.now check the “music” menu and itll be there

Read full topic
item.source: How to put songs in a massively mini meda(very easy)
